about_the_game:
Wild Wild Space lets you join a Space Gang in a fight to claim territory in its name. Upgrade your hideout and help your gang grow in power until it claims the whole galaxy!

JOIN A SPACE GANG!

The ruthless Lawbringers, the mysterious Old Buffalos and the fanatic Cowbots are at war. Discover their story and ideals, choose which one to support and tip the balance on its favor.

BECOME THE MOST DANGEROUS OUTLAW!

Level up your encampment and gain access to a wide variety of perks and upgrades to defeat tougher foes!

ENGAGE WITH ENEMY PLAYER GANGS!

Rob and attack other player encampments through our asynchronous multiplayer system! But beware, you could be a target as well.
detailed_description:
Wild Wild Space lets you join a Space Gang in a fight to claim territory in its name. Upgrade your hideout and help your gang grow in power until it claims the whole galaxy!

JOIN A SPACE GANG!

The ruthless Lawbringers, the mysterious Old Buffalos and the fanatic Cowbots are at war. Discover their story and ideals, choose which one to support and tip the balance on its favor.

BECOME THE MOST DANGEROUS OUTLAW!

Level up your encampment and gain access to a wide variety of perks and upgrades to defeat tougher foes!

ENGAGE WITH ENEMY PLAYER GANGS!

Rob and attack other player encampments through our asynchronous multiplayer system! But beware, you could be a target as well.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Wild Wild Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti or Radeon HD 7750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Drogas lícitas

short_description: Welcome to the New Wild West! Join a space gang, become the galaxy's most dangerous outlaw, explore planets filled with enemy space gangs and shoot your way through them in this bullet hellish galaxy-crawler roguelite.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
